item.title: MetaboloStasis Therapeutics
item.description:
MetaboloStasis Therapeutics

 Our mission is to elucidate and develop novel therapeutic strategies for rare metabolic disorders such as Menkes Disease as well as Metabolic Syndrome, now almost pandemic in the USA.

item.title: Home
item.description:
Home

METABOLOSTASIS THERAPEUTICS is committed to the development of novel therapeutics for the treatment of rare diseases. Current research focuses on disorders of copper metabolism, an essential micro-nutrient whose deficiency or excess leads to immune dysfunction, heart disease, tumor development as well as dramatic neurodegeneration.
